1.content:
You are Flash a tiny guy of only two inches tall. Luckily you are practically indestructible but you've rarely been harmed in any way. You've lived an easy care free life with your wealthy family but there was one problem. It was extremely boring. You spent your days doing physical training keeping yourself at the peak of physical fitness, for your size anyways. But you wanted to strike out on your own. Somehow a woman named Gwen found out about you and explained an interesting job about being a paparazzi. Gwen was also very hot so you quickly jumped on the opportunity to check this out.

Within a couple days arrangements were set and a small airplane drone flew in to pick you up. You stepped in and you heard Gwen's voice over the speakers. "Strap in and you'll be delivered to your new home." You excitedly followed her orders and were soon flown to a remote hilly and forested area and the plane landed on a seemingly simple building. You stepped out of the plane and right on front of you were two huge black high heels. You slowly stared up these gorgeous silky smooth legs and up to the tight fit body of your new boss who also had quite a lovely pair of- TAP TAP TAP- her foot tapped on the floor impatiently as you checked her out which suddenly made you stare directly up at her gorgeous face. She had light blue eyes a long red hair that was slightly wavy. "Its nice to meet you in person Flash, I'm Gwen." You were quickly picked up in her hand as she examined you. "Wow you are really small. I was half expecting this to be a waste of time. You weren't lying about being indestructible though were you?" You shook your head "Nope you've got nothing to worry about" She looked a bit suspicious but shrugged her shoulders. "Look you're gonna be wearing something very expensive and difficult to make I need to be sure do you understand?" You nodded and said "go ahead squeeze me in your hands" She laughed and held you gently in a soft grip "Easy tiger I'm not going to do a damn thing to you until this is all official"

With that she took you into the simple building that looked very... normal. A one bedroom apartment with a small kitchen and living room. Your bedroom was a hole in the wall of her bedroom and she had fitted it with tiny furniture and even a tv and small computer. It was actually pretty nice. She then took you to an elevator which went down deep into the hill the apartment was built on into a massive laboratory. "Wow this is amazing!" you gasped as she showed you various machines and projects she was working on. "I've done this all by myself but I need more funding to keep expanding and that is where you come in. Clients, very rich ones will pay huge amounts of money for the shots we will be able to get of famous people. They will send me an email with the details and you will wear my suit" she shows you to a tiny suit that was all black and smooth looking. kind of like black suit spider-man but without the mask. "Cool! can I try it on now?" Gwen laughs and replies "Hell no you've gotta sign this contract first" You read it through and it pledges 2 years of working for Gwen with a 1 billion dollar salary! however she is not responsible for any harm you go through and the suit can be manually controlled by Gwen whenever she chooses. On the bright side you are not responsible for any damage it or any other equipment takes. You quickly sign. And nod. "Ok little guy I'm gonna squeeze you in my hand now whenever you're ready" You give her a thumbs up and she quickly squeezes you in her grip as tight as she can and winces looking away from you. You forgot how much this hurts as her fingers compress you like play dough squashing you flat. She opens her hand and slowly looks and sees you regaining your shape little by little. She studies you as you suddenly pop back into your normal self. "Wow! that is amazing! I was really worried there for a second. You are gonna be perfect for this!"

11131.content:
"Alright Flash so your first mission should be nice and easy. Your first target is Miranda Cosgrove." Gwen said, rapidly typing. A small picture of the beautiful celeb appeared in the upper right hand corner of your vision, along with information about her. The 21 year old brunette lived quite close, in a large apartment in LA, making her an easy target.

"So what exactly do I have to do?" You asked, excited for your first mission.

Gwen smiled, sending your eagerness. "It's simple. All you have to do is sneak into her apartment, and look at what I tell you to. Fashion magazines want to see what she is going to be wearing at the next big event, and if we can get that information they'll pay through the nose. You might have to do some searching to find it, but nothing too complicated. Just a little rummaging."

"Sounds good. I'm ready when you are!" As soon as you said this, Gwen punched a few keys and a propellor popped out of your suit as if from nowhere. Before you could say a word it had flown you out of the room to the adjacent one, containing a miniature plane. In seconds you were strapped in and on your way to your first target.

Faster than you thought possible, your suit alerted you to the fact that you had arrived at your destination. You wondered where your plane was going to land, but not for long. The floor suddenly dropped out from under you, sending you plummeting down towards Miranda's apartment building. You screamed for Gwen, sure something had gone wrong. Luckily, this was all part of the plan, and your parachute deployed before you hit the roof. You landed gently on the roof of the building, and your parachute instantly retracted into the suit.

"This sure is an amazing suit Gwen."

Her response echoed in your ears, "Thanks Flash. Now for the interesting part. Luckily, Miranda's apartment is the penthouse, so it's directly below you. All you have to do is walk over to the edge and swing down into her window."

You were a little nervous as you approached the edge, looking down to see the ground far below. At your size, it was miles away, and suit or no suit the thought of falling terrified you. As you teetered on the edge, trying to work up your courage, Gwen's voice was suddenly back.

"Oh for Pete's sake do I have to do everything?" she asked, before you suddenly lost control of your limbs. You suddenly found yourself launched into the top of the crack of the open window, finally entering her apartment.

Your propellers kicked in again, flying you into her apartment. It was the fanciest appartment you had ever seen. You seemed to be in her kitchen/dining room area. There was a place set at the table, with a tall glass of soda and a plate of spaghetti sitting in front of it. It smelled absolutely delicious, and you were tempted to swoop down and get a whiff.

One way or another, your wish would be granted, though not in the way you intended. As you flew over, the word "WARNING" flashed across your vision as your propellers screeched to a halt.

"Gwen! What's going on?!" you scream as you begin to plummet from the air.

"I don't know Flash the suit seems to be malfunctioning! Just get ready for a crash landing!"

No parachute would be deploying this time, as you headed in for a crash landing.....

14.content:
"You are gonna be perfect for this!" Gwen exclaims, which prods you to get a huge, proud grin on your face.

"Let's get you into that suit and run some tests Flash." Gwen instructs you. She carefully hands you your suit and instructs you to put it on along with the contact lenses that will serve as the camera. You do so quickly and are surprised to see how well the suit fits your tiny body. It's comfortable and lightweight.

Gwen tells you that while she was impressed with your durability, she needed to test your athleticism to fully learn what you were and were not capable of while wearing the suit. She directs you to sprint as she times you. She asks you to climb some threads to see what could support your weight and how quickly you could climb. She keeps you constantly moving to test your stamina.

After a few minutes, Gwen tells you that you can relax so you stop and catch your breath. She reviews her notes and smiles. She is impressed by your athletic ability!

"You really live up to your name Flash!" She smiles. "These numbers, when factoring in your size, would be nearly the equivalent of an Olympic level athlete!"

You smile through your long breaths at her praise. Gwen continues "We have just one more test to run."

She instructs you to climb the leg of a nearby chair and sprint to the middle of the seat. You do as instructed, assuming that this was another ability test.

You assumed incorrectly.

"Now hold still. Don't move." Gwen instructs you as she moves in front of the chair. She slowly smoothed the bottom of her form fitting skirt against her round rear. You remember that the suit gives Gwen full control over your movements. "I told you not to move. Now it's time to get you back into position." She smiles as she pushes buttons on her controller, causing you to turn around and slowly walk back to the middle of the chair.

"That's a good boy," Gwen says. She turns her back to you and prepares to sit. This time, instead of pushing her skirt against her body she slowly unzips it and let's it fall to the floor. You still feel all the abuse to your body but have lived hidden and secretly and practically unscathed.. until now.
